attributes.additional_details: I was recently charged £190 to wrap a bandage around my dogs foot as he snapped a claw and it was bleeding really badly, I was told if I didnt pay £149 just for them to see him they would not treat him just leave him to bleed, this is an absolute disgrace and should be changed, if it was a human you would be jailed
attributes.background: Lower vet charges, its disgusting what vets are allowed to charge, if you dont pay what they want they refuse to treat your animal, this is a disgrace and should be made illegal,

rejection.details:
Veterinary fees are set by vets themselves, not the Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition calling for a clear action that is the responsibility of the Government or Parliament, for example calling for a review a vets fees or for legislation to cap certain types of vets fees. 

There's already a petition about vets prescription fees, which you might like to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/259400
